Wellen -- a framework for exploring and teaching generative music making and algorithmic compositions

Package wellen

Class Sequencer<T>

java.lang.Object
wellen.Sequencer<T>
Type Parameters:
T - type of sequenced data. usually, int or float but could be also be a complex data types.
public class Sequencer<T> extends Object
a container for values ( e.g musical notes ) that can be played back step by step.
